long_description: Don't you hate when your favorite beverage loses its frosty (or piping-hot) goodness before you can enjoy it? The 30 fl. oz. YETI Rambler Tumbler solves the problem with double-wall vacuum insulation. Made with high-quality 18/8 stainless steel and features double-wall vacuum insulation to keep your drinks hot or cold for hours to come. Rambler Tumbler keeps ice frozen twice as long as a plastic tumbler, and it works just as well for hot beverages. Includes a clear lid so you can keep an eye on how much beverage you have left. Mug and lid are BPA free. YETI Rambler Tumbler fits in most car cup holders.
